text: 13.13: Ru 21.34; Ef 5.18; Fi 4.8; 1 Te 4.12; Ze 3.14; 1 Pi 2.12; 4.3Nza nzerara ruv, guma raar rui tɨvar muuŋv, nza nzerara rurga. Nza fhura ndikndigɨp, ferferɨp, pharar ŋanŋani mbɨp, ŋanŋanɨv rurga fhuvara. Nza fhura ruarir mbigi gu gumgi wari ndiv, nza fhura tɨvi mbatɨgi, nza ntan sunuv, ntan muunga fhuvara. Nza vhɨra fhura tamtam ntarir muuŋv, fhura harigi gumgi ga vhegɨp, mben ndavi shirga fhuvara.
